%purge: Deletes a selected number of messages.
%kick: Kicks a member and dms them the reason and person who kicked them.
%ban: Bans a member and DMs them the reason and person who banned them.
%ban @Latkecrszy#0947 Insulting other members and generally being a meanie.
%warn: DMs a member the server they were warned in and the reason for the warning.
%warn @Latkecrszy#0947 Calling me a 'mean mod'. I'm not mean!
%rename: Changes the nickname of a member in your server.
%mute: Applies a mute to a member, removing their roles and adding the mute role.
%tempmute: Mutes a member for a select amount of time.
%tempmute @Latkecrszy#0947 10m take a break and cool down.
%unmute: Adds the roles back to a member and removes the mute role.
%lockdown: Locks down a channel, allowing only admins to talk.
%unlock: Unlocks a channel, allowing the people that could talk previously to talk.
%modmute: Deletes all messages an admin sends, effectively muting them.
%modunmute: Stops deleting all messages from an admin.
%slowmode: Creates a slowmode for a channel.
%welcome: Sets a channel and message to welcome new members with.
%welcome #welcome Hi member! Welcome to Hurb Central! We hope you enjoy your time here!
%goodbye: Sets a channel and message to say goodbye to members with.
%goodbye #goodbye Aww. member left. Can we get an f in the chat?
%createrole: Creates a role with a given color and name.
%deleterole: Deletes a role with a given name.
%autorole: Sets a role to automatically assign to people when they join the server.
%removeautorole: Removes one of the autoroles from the list, so it will no longer add it when they join.
Stops giving new members a role.
%serverinfo: Shows you general information about the server.
%info: Shows general information about you or another member of the server.

%start: Starts an account for you with $1000-10000.
%balance: See how much money you have, or ping another user to see their balance.
%blackjack: Play a game of blackjack; use %help blackjack to see more info.
%slots: Play a game of slots; get two of the same icon to win your bet, and get all three the same for a whopping 1000 times your bet!
%coinflip: Flip a coin, and either wins or loses your bet.
%buyrole: Buy a role from your server role shop.
%roleprice: Set the price of a role.
%shop: See the item shop, along with how many of each item you have.
%roleshop: Shows you the role shop for your server.
%buy: Buy an item from the shop.
%items: See your items, and how many of each you have.

%gif: Search giphy for your favorite gifs!
%rps: Play a game of rock paper scissors against hurb!
%kill: Kill someone in a fun and creative way!
%redpanda: Look at some cute red pandas!
%autodoggo: Look at a cute doggo every 7 seconds!
%stopautodoggo: Stop looking at cute doggos every 7 seconds. (But why would you ever want to do that though?).
%autocatto: Look at a cute catto every 7 seconds!
%stopautocatto: Stop looking at cute cattos every 7 seconds. (Although this one is a crime to use).
%hangman: Play hangman against Hurb! Note: only usable if you have purchased the hangman item from the shop.

%enable ranking: Turn on ranking in your server.
%disable ranking: Turn off ranking in your server.
%rank: See your (or someone else's) level, messages, and xp for the server.
%leaderboard: Take a look at the leaderboard for the server.
%levelupchannel: Set a message to send level up messages in, or set it to none to have them send in the user's active channel.
%levelrole: Sets a role to assign once a member reaches a certain level.
%rankcolor: Set an emoji to display your rank as, or even set it to a word if you want!

auto.%enable invitecheck: Turns on an invite blocker for the server.
auto.%disable invitecheck: Turns off an invite blocker for the server.
auto.%enable nonocheck: Turns on a swear word blocker for the server.
auto.%disable nonocheck: Turns off a swear word blocker for the server.
auto.%enable nitro: Turns on an emoji converter for the server; see more info with the `%help nitro` command.
auto.%disable nitro: Turns off an emoji converter for the server; see more info with the `%help nitro` command.
auto.%enable linkcheck: Turns on a link blocker for the server.
auto.%disable linkcheck: Turns off a link blocker for the server.
auto.%enable ranking: Turns on a ranking system for the server.
auto.%disable ranking: Turns off a ranking system for the server.
